snippet.title: Railroads Online Departs Early Access Soon and Arrives in The Console World!
snippet.description:
Dear Community, 

As we approach our third anniversary, we have several significant updates to share. The past few months have been marked by continuous feature releases, constant improvements, and major upgrades. Now, we are excited to announce our next big steps: 

Later this year, we will be exiting Early Access and launching on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X. 

Read more in our Steam announcement:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1696810/view/4362382965818612537?l=english

Join our Discord to get more information and to connect with other Players:
https://discord.gg/BjEm3wX9t6

Link to our game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1696810/Railroads_Online/

Link to our Roadmap:
https://trello.com/b/wPd1cEx2/railroads-online-update-roadmap


#rro #ro #astragon #railroadsonline #train #simulationgames #trainsimulator #steamlocomotive #steam #xboxseriesx #xbox #playstation #playstation5 #consolegaming
